raw: {"epics": [{"id": "EPIC-1", "title": "Task Management Core Functionality", "description": "Develop the core features of the To-Do List application, enabling users to add, edit, mark as completed, and delete tasks. This epic is critical to deliver the main business value: allowing users to efficiently manage their daily tasks.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 80, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "FE-1", "title": "Add New Task", "description": "As a user, I want to add a new task with a title and optional description so that I can keep track of things I need to do.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can enter a task title (required) and description (optional)", "Task is added to the list upon submission", "Input fields are cleared after adding", "Error is shown if title is missing"], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 12, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-1-1", "title": "Design Add Task UI", "description": "Create wireframes and UI components for the add task form, ensuring accessibility and responsiveness.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-1-2", "title": "Implement Add Task Functionality (Frontend)", "description": "Develop the frontend logic to capture user input and trigger task creation.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-1-1", "title": "Implement Add Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to accept new task data and store it in the database.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-1-1", "title": "Test Add Task Feature", "description": "Write and execute test cases to verify task creation, validation, and error handling.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-2", "title": "Edit Task", "description": "As a user, I want to edit an existing task's title or description so that I can update my tasks as needed.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can open an edit form for any task", "User can update the title and/or description", "Changes are saved and reflected in the task list", "Error is shown if title is empty"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 10, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-2-1", "title": "Design Edit Task UI", "description": "Create UI for editing tasks, including modal or inline editing options.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-2-2", "title": "Implement Edit Task Functionality (Frontend)", "description": "Develop frontend logic to allow users to edit and save changes to tasks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-2-1", "title": "Implement Edit Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to update task details in the database.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-2-1", "title": "Test Edit Task Feature", "description": "Write and execute test cases for editing tasks, including validation and error handling.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-3", "title": "Mark Task as Completed", "description": "As a user, I want to mark a task as completed so that I can track my progress.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can mark any task as completed", "Completed tasks are visually distinguished", "User can unmark a completed task"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-3-1", "title": "Design Completed Task UI", "description": "Design visual indicators for completed tasks (e.g., strikethrough, color change).", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 1, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-3-2", "title": "Implement Mark as Completed (Frontend)", "description": "Develop frontend logic to toggle task completion status.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-3-1", "title": "Implement Mark as Completed API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to update task completion status.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-3-1", "title": "Test Mark as Completed Feature", "description": "Write and execute test cases for marking tasks as completed and uncompleted.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "FE-4", "title": "Delete Task", "description": "As a user, I want to delete a task so that I can remove tasks I no longer need.", "acceptance_criteria": ["User can delete any task", "Deleted tasks are removed from the list", "User is prompted to confirm deletion"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-4-1", "title": "Design Delete Task UI", "description": "Design delete button and confirmation dialog for task deletion.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 1, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-4-2", "title": "Implement Delete Task Functionality (Frontend)", "description": "Develop frontend logic to trigger task deletion and update the UI.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-4-1", "title": "Implement Delete Task API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to delete tasks from the database.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-4-1", "title": "Test Delete Task Feature", "description": "Write and execute test cases for deleting tasks and handling errors.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}]}, {"id": "EPIC-2", "title": "Task List Display and User Experience", "description": "Implement the task list display and ensure a responsive, intuitive user experience across desktop and mobile browsers. This epic ensures users can easily view and interact with their tasks.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 40, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "FE-5", "title": "Display All Tasks in a List", "description": "As a user, I want to see all my tasks in a list so that I can easily review and manage them.", "acceptance_criteria": ["All tasks are displayed in a scrollable list", "Each task shows title, description, and completion status", "List updates in real-time as tasks are added, edited, completed, or deleted"], "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 10, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-5-1", "title": "Design Task List UI", "description": "Create wireframes and UI components for the task list, ensuring clarity and accessibility.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-5-2", "title": "Implement Task List Rendering (Frontend)", "description": "Develop frontend logic to render the task list and update it dynamically.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-5-1", "title": "Implement Get Tasks API (Backend)", "description": "Create backend endpoint to fetch all tasks from the database.", "priority": "Critical", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-5-1", "title": "Test Task List Display", "description": "Write and execute test cases for task list rendering and real-time updates.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "UX-1", "title": "Responsive Design for Desktop and Mobile", "description": "As a user, I want the app to work seamlessly on both desktop and mobile browsers so that I can manage tasks from any device.", "acceptance_criteria": ["App layout adapts to different screen sizes", "All features are accessible and usable on mobile devices", "No horizontal scrolling required on mobile"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 8, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "UX-1-1", "title": "Design Responsive Layout", "description": "Create responsive design mockups for key screens.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-6-1", "title": "Implement Responsive Styles", "description": "Develop CSS and frontend logic to ensure responsive behavior.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-6-1", "title": "Test Responsiveness", "description": "Test app on various devices and browsers for responsive design compliance.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "UX-2", "title": "User Experience and Accessibility Enhancements", "description": "As a user, I want the app to be easy to use and accessible so that everyone can manage their tasks efficiently.", "acceptance_criteria": ["App meets WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility standards", "Keyboard navigation is supported", "Clear focus indicators and ARIA labels are present"], "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 6, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "UX-2-1", "title": "Accessibility Audit", "description": "Review UI components for accessibility compliance.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "FE-7-1", "title": "Implement Accessibility Improvements", "description": "Add ARIA labels, focus indicators, and keyboard navigation support.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-7-1", "title": "Accessibility Testing", "description": "Test app for accessibility using screen readers and keyboard navigation.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "QA-8", "title": "Performance Optimization", "description": "As a user, I want the app to load quickly (within 3 seconds) so that I can access my tasks without delay.", "acceptance_criteria": ["App loads within 3 seconds on standard broadband/mobile connections", "All assets are optimized for fast loading"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 6, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "FE-8-1", "title": "Optimize Frontend Assets", "description": "Minify and bundle JS/CSS, optimize images, and implement lazy loading where appropriate.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "BE-8-1", "title": "Optimize Backend Performance", "description": "Ensure backend APIs respond quickly and efficiently.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-8-1", "title": "Performance Testing", "description": "Test app load times and optimize as needed.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}]}, {"id": "EPIC-3", "title": "Infrastructure, Deployment, and Quality Assurance", "description": "Set up the technical infrastructure, deployment pipelines, and quality assurance processes to ensure the To-Do List app is robust, maintainable, and easy to deploy.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 30, "status": "To Do", "stories": [{"id": "DEVOPS-1", "title": "Set Up Development and Production Environments", "description": "As a developer, I want reliable environments for development, testing, and production so that the app can be built, tested, and deployed efficiently.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Development, staging, and production environments are available", "Automated deployment pipeline is set up", "Environment variables are managed securely"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 10, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "DEVOPS-1-1", "title": "Provision Cloud Infrastructure", "description": "Set up cloud resources (e.g., hosting, database, storage) for all environments.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "DEVOPS-1-2", "title": "Configure CI/CD Pipeline", "description": "Implement continuous integration and deployment pipeline for automated builds and deployments.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "DEVOPS-1-3", "title": "Manage Environment Variables", "description": "Set up secure management of environment variables for all environments.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "QA-9", "title": "Automated Testing and Quality Assurance", "description": "As a QA engineer, I want automated tests for all core features so that regressions are caught early and the app remains stable.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Unit tests cover all core business logic", "Integration tests cover API endpoints", "End-to-end tests cover main user flows"], "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 10, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "QA-9-1", "title": "Write Unit Tests", "description": "Develop unit tests for frontend and backend business logic.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-9-2", "title": "Write Integration Tests", "description": "Develop integration tests for API endpoints.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "QA-9-3", "title": "Write End-to-End Tests", "description": "Develop end-to-end tests for main user flows using a tool like Cypress or Selenium.", "priority": "High", "estimated_hours": 3, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "PM-1", "title": "Product Management and Documentation", "description": "As a product manager, I want clear documentation and project tracking so that the team can deliver on time and stakeholders are informed.", "acceptance_criteria": ["Project plan and timeline are documented", "Feature documentation is available", "Release notes are published for each version"], "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 6, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "PM-1-1", "title": "Create Project Plan and Timeline", "description": "Document project milestones, deliverables, and estimated timelines.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "PM-1-2", "title": "Write Feature Documentation", "description": "Document all features, user stories, and acceptance criteria.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "PM-1-3", "title": "Publish Release Notes", "description": "Prepare and distribute release notes for each app version.", "priority": "Low", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}]}, {"id": "IT-1", "title": "Security and Compliance Review", "description": "As an IT/security specialist, I want to ensure the app follows security best practices and complies with relevant standards.", "acceptance_criteria": ["App does not expose sensitive data", "All dependencies are up to date and free of known vulnerabilities", "Basic data privacy practices are followed"], "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 4, "status": "To Do", "subtasks": [{"id": "IT-1-1", "title": "Conduct Security Audit", "description": "Review codebase and infrastructure for security vulnerabilities.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 2, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "IT-1-2", "title": "Update Dependencies", "description": "Ensure all libraries and dependencies are up to date.", "priority": "Medium", "estimated_hours": 1, "status": "To Do"}, {"id": "IT-1-3", "title": "Document Data Privacy Practices", "description": "Document how user data is handled and stored.", "priority": "Low", "estimated_hours": 1, "status": "To Do"}]}]}], "total_estimated_hours": 150, "timeline_weeks": 6}
